Quick Start Guide¶

  • 1. Launch the Web UI

  • 2. Create a New DAG

  • 3. Edit the DAG

  • 4. Execute the DAG

1. Launch the Web UI¶

Start the server with dagu server and browse to http://127.0.0.1:8080 to explore the Web UI.

Note: The server will be started on port 8080 by default. You can change the port by passing --port option. See Server’s Host and Port Configuration for more details.

2. Create a New DAG¶

Create a DAG by clicking the New DAG button on the top page of the web UI. Input example in the dialog.

3. Edit the DAG¶

Go to the SPEC Tab and hit the Edit button. Copy & Paste the following YAML code into the editor.

schedule: "0 0 * * *"
tags: Daily
steps:
  - name: "S1"
    command: "sleep 2"
  - name: "S2"
    command: "sleep 2"
    depends:
      - "S1"
  - name: "S3"
    command: "sleep 2"
    depends:
      - "S1"
  - name: "S4"
    command: "sleep 2"
    depends:
      - "S2"
      - "S3"

4. Execute the DAG¶

You can execute the example by pressing the Start button.
